CustomField.description: Total Hours a case was worked by our support teams. Time spent in "Closed" Statuses is excluded in instances where clients/teams reopen cases at a later date
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Total Hours a case was worked by our support teams. Time spent in "Closed" Statuses is excluded in instances where clients/teams reopen cases at a later date
CustomField.label: Hours to Resolve Case
